Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime print("=== GATWICK AND LUTON AIRPORT EXPANSION PROPOSALS RESEARCH - FIXED VERSION ===") print("Objective: Find non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities") print("Secondary objective: Look for energy harvesting floor tiles or kinetic energy technology") print("Fixing previous errors: DDGS import and api_key scope issues") print("=" * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables at module level api_key = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key: print(f"‚úÖ SerpAPI key found - will use Google Search API") else: print("‚ö†Ô∏è No SerpAPI key found - will use requests-based web scraping") # Define comprehensive search queries targeting specific scenarios search_queries = [ # Gatwick expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Gatwick Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Gatwick Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Luton expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Luton Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Luton Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Luton Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Combined searches for both airports 'Gatwick Luton Airport expansion proposals non-shortlisted comparison', 'UK airport expansion proposals rejected Planning Inspectorate Gatwick Luton', # Energy harvesting technology searches 'Gatwick Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy', 'Luton Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy technology', 'UK airports energy harvesting floor tiles Gatwick Luton', 'airport kinetic energy floor tiles technology Gatwick Luton installation', 'energy harvesting technology airports UK Gatwick Luton renewable' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} targeted queries...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Function to search using SerpAPI (primary method) def search_with_serpapi(query, max_results=15): """Search using SerpAPI Google Search - requires API key""" if not api_key: print("No SerpAPI key available") return [] try: params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.co.uk", "safe": "off", "num": max_results, "type": "search", "gl": "uk" } response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() if data.get("organic_results"): return [{ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'href': result.get('link', ''), 'body': result.get('snippet', '') } for result in data["organic_results"]] return [] except Exception as e: print(f"SerpAPI search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Function to search using DuckDuckGo (fallback method) def search_with_duckduckgo(query, max_results=10): """Search using DuckDuckGo instant answer API - no key required""" try: # Use DuckDuckGo instant answer API url = "https://api.duckduckgo.com/" params = { 'q': query, 'format': 'json', 'no_redirect': '1', 'no_html': '1', 'skip_disambig': '1' } response = requests.get(url, params=params, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() results = [] # Extract abstract if available if data.get('Abstract'): results.append({ 'title': data.get('Heading', 'DuckDuckGo Result'), 'href': data.get('AbstractURL', ''), 'body': data.get('Abstract', '') }) # Extract related topics for topic in data.get('RelatedTopics', [])[:5]: if isinstance(topic, dict) and topic.get('Text'): results.append({ 'title': topic.get('Text', '')[:100], 'href': topic.get('FirstURL', ''), 'body': topic.get('Text', '') }) return results return [] except Exception as e: print(f"DuckDuckGo search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Function to search using direct web scraping (last resort) def search_with_web_scraping(query, max_results=5): """Basic web scraping approach - limited but no API required""" try: # This is a simplified approach - in practice would need more sophisticated scraping # For now, return empty to focus on API-based searches print(f"Web scraping not implemented for: {query[:50]}...") return [] except Exception as e: print(f"Web scraping error: {str(e)}") return [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) results = [] search_method = 'none' # Try SerpAPI first if available if api_key: print("Trying SerpAPI...") results = search_with_serpapi(query) if results: search_method = 'serpapi' print(f"SerpAPI returned {len(results)} results") # If no results from SerpAPI, try DuckDuckGo if not results: print("Trying DuckDuckGo API...") results = search_with_duckduckgo(query) if results: search_method = 'duckduckgo' print(f"DuckDuckGo returned {len(results)} results") # If still no results, try web scraping (placeholder) if not results: print("Trying web scraping...") results = search_with_web_scraping(query) if results: search_method = 'webscraping' if results: print(f"\n‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results using {search_method}") # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('href', result.get('link', 'No link')) snippet = result.get('body', result.get('snippet', 'No snippet')) print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet[:300]}..." if len(snippet) > 300 else f"Snippet: {snippet}") # Check for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" # Key indicators for airport expansion expansion_indicators = [ 'non-shortlisted', 'rejected', 'planning inspectorate', 'expansion proposal', 'gatwick', 'luton', 'assessment authority', 'submission date', 'government assessment', 'planning authority', 'expansion decision' ] # Key indicators for energy harvesting energy_indicators = [ 'energy harvesting', 'floor tiles', 'kinetic energy', 'renewable energy', 'energy generation', 'footstep energy', 'piezoelectric', 'energy technology' ] matching_expansion = [indicator for indicator in expansion_indicators if indicator in combined_text] matching_energy = [indicator for indicator in energy_indicators if indicator in combined_text] total_matches = len(matching_expansion) + len(matching_energy) if total_matches >= 3: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - {total_matches} key indicators") if matching_expansion: print(f" Expansion indicators: {matching_expansion}") if matching_energy: print(f" Energy indicators: {matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - {total_matches} indicators: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 1: print(f"üìù Some relevance - {total_matches} indicator: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with analysis all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'expansion_indicators': matching_expansion, 'energy_indicators': matching_energy, 'total_relevance_score': total_matches, 'search_method': search_method }) else: print(f"‚ùå No results found for query {i}: '{query}'") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_expansion_search_results_fixed_{timestamp}.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find Gatwick and Luton Airport non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities, plus energy harvesting technology', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results, 'search_methods_used': list(set([r['search_method'] for r in all_results])) if all_results else [], 'api_key_available': bool(api_key) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nüìä SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") if all_results: # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nüîç ANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] >= 3] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 2] low_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 1] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (3+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results[:5]: # Show top 5 print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") if result['expansion_indicators']: print(f"Expansion indicators: {result['expansion_indicators']}") if result['energy_indicators']: print(f"Energy indicators: {result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:3]: # Show top 3 print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['expansion_indicators'] + result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nLow relevance results (1 indicator): {len(low_relevance_results)}") # Look for specific airport mentions and key information print(f"\n\nüè¢ SPECIFIC AIRPORT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) gatwick_results = [r for r in all_results if 'gatwick' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] luton_results = [r for r in all_results if 'luton' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] energy_results = [r for r in all_results if len(r['energy_indicators']) > 0] print(f"Gatwick Airport mentions: {len(gatwick_results)}") print(f"Luton Airport mentions: {len(luton_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting technology mentions: {len(energy_results)}") # Look for specific dates and authorities date_patterns = ['2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023', '2024'] authority_patterns = ['planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'planning authority', 'government'] date_mentions = {} authority_mentions = {} for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for date in date_patterns: if date in combined_text: if date not in date_mentions: date_mentions[date] = [] date_mentions[date].append(result) for authority in authority_patterns: if authority in combined_text: if authority not in authority_mentions: authority_mentions[authority] = [] authority_mentions[authority].append(result) print(f"\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:") for date, mentions in date_mentions.items(): print(f" {date}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è AUTHORITY MENTIONS FOUND:") for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Create summary analysis summary_analysis = { 'total_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_count': len(high_relevance_results), 'medium_relevance_count': len(medium_relevance_results), 'gatwick_mentions': len(gatwick_results), 'luton_mentions': len(luton_results), 'energy_technology_mentions': len(energy_results), 'date_mentions': {date: len(mentions) for date, mentions in date_mentions.items()}, 'authority_mentions': {authority: len(mentions) for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items()} } # Save summary analysis summary_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_search_summary_{timestamp}.json' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(summary_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nüíæ Summary analysis saved to: {summary_file}") else: print("\n‚ùå No search results obtained - all search methods failed") print("This could be due to:") print(" - Network connectivity issues") print(" - API rate limiting") print(" - Search terms too specific") print(" - Temporary service unavailability") print(f"\n‚úÖ Search phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific submission dates and assessing authorities.")

Code Execution - Plan #3 (Iteration 3)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime print("=== GATWICK AND LUTON AIRPORT EXPANSION PROPOSALS RESEARCH - SCOPE FIXED ====") print("Objective: Find non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities") print("Secondary objective: Look for energy harvesting floor tiles or kinetic energy technology") print("Fixing variable scope issues by passing api_key as parameter") print("=" * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables api_key_env = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key_env: print(f"‚úÖ SerpAPI key found - will use Google Search API") else: print("‚ö†Ô∏è No SerpAPI key found - will use DuckDuckGo API only") # Define comprehensive search queries targeting specific scenarios search_queries = [ # Gatwick expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Gatwick Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Gatwick Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Luton expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Luton Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Luton Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Luton Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Combined searches for both airports 'Gatwick Luton Airport expansion proposals non-shortlisted comparison', 'UK airport expansion proposals rejected Planning Inspectorate Gatwick Luton', # Energy harvesting technology searches 'Gatwick Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy', 'Luton Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy technology', 'UK airports energy harvesting floor tiles Gatwick Luton', 'airport kinetic energy floor tiles technology Gatwick Luton installation', 'energy harvesting technology airports UK Gatwick Luton renewable' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} targeted queries...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Function to search using SerpAPI (primary method) - FIXED: api_key as parameter def search_with_serpapi(query, api_key, max_results=15): """Search using SerpAPI Google Search - requires API key""" if not api_key: print("No SerpAPI key provided") return [] try: params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.co.uk", "safe": "off", "num": max_results, "type": "search", "gl": "uk" } response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() if data.get("organic_results"): return [{ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'href': result.get('link', ''), 'body': result.get('snippet', '') } for result in data["organic_results"]] return [] except Exception as e: print(f"SerpAPI search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Function to search using DuckDuckGo (fallback method) def search_with_duckduckgo(query, max_results=10): """Search using DuckDuckGo instant answer API - no key required""" try: # Use DuckDuckGo instant answer API url = "https://api.duckduckgo.com/" params = { 'q': query, 'format': 'json', 'no_redirect': '1', 'no_html': '1', 'skip_disambig': '1' } response = requests.get(url, params=params, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() results = [] # Extract abstract if available if data.get('Abstract'): results.append({ 'title': data.get('Heading', 'DuckDuckGo Result'), 'href': data.get('AbstractURL', ''), 'body': data.get('Abstract', '') }) # Extract related topics for topic in data.get('RelatedTopics', [])[:5]: if isinstance(topic, dict) and topic.get('Text'): results.append({ 'title': topic.get('Text', '')[:100], 'href': topic.get('FirstURL', ''), 'body': topic.get('Text', '') }) return results return [] except Exception as e: print(f"DuckDuckGo search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) results = [] search_method = 'none' # Try SerpAPI first if available - FIXED: pass api_key as parameter if api_key_env: print("Trying SerpAPI...") results = search_with_serpapi(query, api_key_env) if results: search_method = 'serpapi' print(f"SerpAPI returned {len(results)} results") # If no results from SerpAPI, try DuckDuckGo if not results: print("Trying DuckDuckGo API...") results = search_with_duckduckgo(query) if results: search_method = 'duckduckgo' print(f"DuckDuckGo returned {len(results)} results") if results: print(f"\n‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results using {search_method}") # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('href', result.get('link', 'No link')) snippet = result.get('body', result.get('snippet', 'No snippet')) print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet[:300]}..." if len(snippet) > 300 else f"Snippet: {snippet}") # Check for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" # Key indicators for airport expansion expansion_indicators = [ 'non-shortlisted', 'rejected', 'planning inspectorate', 'expansion proposal', 'gatwick', 'luton', 'assessment authority', 'submission date', 'government assessment', 'planning authority', 'expansion decision' ] # Key indicators for energy harvesting energy_indicators = [ 'energy harvesting', 'floor tiles', 'kinetic energy', 'renewable energy', 'energy generation', 'footstep energy', 'piezoelectric', 'energy technology' ] matching_expansion = [indicator for indicator in expansion_indicators if indicator in combined_text] matching_energy = [indicator for indicator in energy_indicators if indicator in combined_text] total_matches = len(matching_expansion) + len(matching_energy) if total_matches >= 3: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - {total_matches} key indicators") if matching_expansion: print(f" Expansion indicators: {matching_expansion}") if matching_energy: print(f" Energy indicators: {matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - {total_matches} indicators: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 1: print(f"üìù Some relevance - {total_matches} indicator: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with analysis all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'expansion_indicators': matching_expansion, 'energy_indicators': matching_energy, 'total_relevance_score': total_matches, 'search_method': search_method }) else: print(f"‚ùå No results found for query {i}: '{query}'") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_expansion_search_results_scope_fixed_{timestamp}.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find Gatwick and Luton Airport non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities, plus energy harvesting technology', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results, 'search_methods_used': list(set([r['search_method'] for r in all_results])) if all_results else [], 'api_key_available': bool(api_key_env) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nüìä SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") if all_results: # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nüîç ANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] >= 3] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 2] low_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 1] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (3+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results[:5]: # Show top 5 print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") if result['expansion_indicators']: print(f"Expansion indicators: {result['expansion_indicators']}") if result['energy_indicators']: print(f"Energy indicators: {result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:3]: # Show top 3 print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['expansion_indicators'] + result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nLow relevance results (1 indicator): {len(low_relevance_results)}") # Look for specific airport mentions and key information print(f"\n\nüè¢ SPECIFIC AIRPORT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) gatwick_results = [r for r in all_results if 'gatwick' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] luton_results = [r for r in all_results if 'luton' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] energy_results = [r for r in all_results if len(r['energy_indicators']) > 0] print(f"Gatwick Airport mentions: {len(gatwick_results)}") print(f"Luton Airport mentions: {len(luton_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting technology mentions: {len(energy_results)}") # Look for specific dates and authorities date_patterns = ['2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023', '2024'] authority_patterns = ['planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'planning authority', 'government'] date_mentions = {} authority_mentions = {} for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for date in date_patterns: if date in combined_text: if date not in date_mentions: date_mentions[date] = [] date_mentions[date].append(result) for authority in authority_patterns: if authority in combined_text: if authority not in authority_mentions: authority_mentions[authority] = [] authority_mentions[authority].append(result) print(f"\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:") for date, mentions in date_mentions.items(): print(f" {date}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è AUTHORITY MENTIONS FOUND:") for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Create summary analysis summary_analysis = { 'total_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_count': len(high_relevance_results), 'medium_relevance_count': len(medium_relevance_results), 'gatwick_mentions': len(gatwick_results), 'luton_mentions': len(luton_results), 'energy_technology_mentions': len(energy_results), 'date_mentions': {date: len(mentions) for date, mentions in date_mentions.items()}, 'authority_mentions': {authority: len(mentions) for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items()} } # Save summary analysis summary_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_search_summary_scope_fixed_{timestamp}.json' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(summary_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nüíæ Summary analysis saved to: {summary_file}") else: print("\n‚ùå No search results obtained - all search methods failed") print("This could be due to:") print(" - Network connectivity issues") print(" - API rate limiting") print(" - Search terms too specific") print(" - Temporary service unavailability") print(f"\n‚úÖ Search phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific submission dates and assessing authorities.")
Execution Output

Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - Code encountered a critical variable scope error that prevented any search execution. The error 'NameError: name 'combined_text' is not defined' occurred during result processing, indicating a variable scoping issue within the search result analysis loop. The code successfully connected to SerpAPI and obtained search results (15 results for Gatwick queries), but failed when trying to analyze the results for relevance indicators. PLAN alignment: ~20% - partial success in obtaining search data but complete failure in processing/analysis phase. The search results show promising Gatwick Airport expansion content including Planning Inspectorate references, but none of this data was properly processed due to the technical error. Immediate fix needed: Define the 'combined_text' variable properly within the result processing loop - it appears the variable definition was accidentally removed or misplaced. The search framework is working and obtaining relevant results, so fixing this single variable scope issue should enable full functionality and complete the PLAN objectives.
Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime print("=== GATWICK AND LUTON AIRPORT EXPANSION PROPOSALS RESEARCH - SCOPE FIXED ====") print("Objective: Find non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities") print("Secondary objective: Look for energy harvesting floor tiles or kinetic energy technology") print("Fixing variable scope issues by passing api_key as parameter") print("=" * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables api_key_env = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key_env: print(f"‚úÖ SerpAPI key found - will use Google Search API") else: print("‚ö†Ô∏è No SerpAPI key found - will use DuckDuckGo API only") # Define comprehensive search queries targeting specific scenarios search_queries = [ # Gatwick expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Gatwick Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Gatwick Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Luton expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Luton Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Luton Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Luton Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Combined searches for both airports 'Gatwick Luton Airport expansion proposals non-shortlisted comparison', 'UK airport expansion proposals rejected Planning Inspectorate Gatwick Luton', # Energy harvesting technology searches 'Gatwick Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy', 'Luton Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy technology', 'UK airports energy harvesting floor tiles Gatwick Luton', 'airport kinetic energy floor tiles technology Gatwick Luton installation', 'energy harvesting technology airports UK Gatwick Luton renewable' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} targeted queries...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Function to search using SerpAPI (primary method) - FIXED: api_key as parameter def search_with_serpapi(query, api_key, max_results=15): """Search using SerpAPI Google Search - requires API key""" if not api_key: print("No SerpAPI key provided") return [] try: params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.co.uk", "safe": "off", "num": max_results, "type": "search", "gl": "uk" } response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() if data.get("organic_results"): return [{ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'href': result.get('link', ''), 'body': result.get('snippet', '') } for result in data["organic_results"]] return [] except Exception as e: print(f"SerpAPI search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Function to search using DuckDuckGo (fallback method) def search_with_duckduckgo(query, max_results=10): """Search using DuckDuckGo instant answer API - no key required""" try: # Use DuckDuckGo instant answer API url = "https://api.duckduckgo.com/" params = { 'q': query, 'format': 'json', 'no_redirect': '1', 'no_html': '1', 'skip_disambig': '1' } response = requests.get(url, params=params, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() results = [] # Extract abstract if available if data.get('Abstract'): results.append({ 'title': data.get('Heading', 'DuckDuckGo Result'), 'href': data.get('AbstractURL', ''), 'body': data.get('Abstract', '') }) # Extract related topics for topic in data.get('RelatedTopics', [])[:5]: if isinstance(topic, dict) and topic.get('Text'): results.append({ 'title': topic.get('Text', '')[:100], 'href': topic.get('FirstURL', ''), 'body': topic.get('Text', '') }) return results return [] except Exception as e: print(f"DuckDuckGo search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) results = [] search_method = 'none' # Try SerpAPI first if available - FIXED: pass api_key as parameter if api_key_env: print("Trying SerpAPI...") results = search_with_serpapi(query, api_key_env) if results: search_method = 'serpapi' print(f"SerpAPI returned {len(results)} results") # If no results from SerpAPI, try DuckDuckGo if not results: print("Trying DuckDuckGo API...") results = search_with_duckduckgo(query) if results: search_method = 'duckduckgo' print(f"DuckDuckGo returned {len(results)} results") if results: print(f"\n‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results using {search_method}") # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('href', result.get('link', 'No link')) snippet = result.get('body', result.get('snippet', 'No snippet')) print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet[:300]}..." if len(snippet) > 300 else f"Snippet: {snippet}") # Check for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" # Key indicators for airport expansion expansion_indicators = [ 'non-shortlisted', 'rejected', 'planning inspectorate', 'expansion proposal', 'gatwick', 'luton', 'assessment authority', 'submission date', 'government assessment', 'planning authority', 'expansion decision' ] # Key indicators for energy harvesting energy_indicators = [ 'energy harvesting', 'floor tiles', 'kinetic energy', 'renewable energy', 'energy generation', 'footstep energy', 'piezoelectric', 'energy technology' ] matching_expansion = [indicator for indicator in expansion_indicators if indicator in combined_text] matching_energy = [indicator for indicator in energy_indicators if indicator in combined_text] total_matches = len(matching_expansion) + len(matching_energy) if total_matches >= 3: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - {total_matches} key indicators") if matching_expansion: print(f" Expansion indicators: {matching_expansion}") if matching_energy: print(f" Energy indicators: {matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - {total_matches} indicators: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 1: print(f"üìù Some relevance - {total_matches} indicator: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with analysis all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'expansion_indicators': matching_expansion, 'energy_indicators': matching_energy, 'total_relevance_score': total_matches, 'search_method': search_method }) else: print(f"‚ùå No results found for query {i}: '{query}'") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_expansion_search_results_scope_fixed_{timestamp}.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find Gatwick and Luton Airport non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities, plus energy harvesting technology', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results, 'search_methods_used': list(set([r['search_method'] for r in all_results])) if all_results else [], 'api_key_available': bool(api_key_env) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nüìä SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") if all_results: # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nüîç ANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] >= 3] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 2] low_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 1] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (3+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results[:5]: # Show top 5 print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") if result['expansion_indicators']: print(f"Expansion indicators: {result['expansion_indicators']}") if result['energy_indicators']: print(f"Energy indicators: {result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:3]: # Show top 3 print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['expansion_indicators'] + result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nLow relevance results (1 indicator): {len(low_relevance_results)}") # Look for specific airport mentions and key information print(f"\n\nüè¢ SPECIFIC AIRPORT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) gatwick_results = [r for r in all_results if 'gatwick' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] luton_results = [r for r in all_results if 'luton' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] energy_results = [r for r in all_results if len(r['energy_indicators']) > 0] print(f"Gatwick Airport mentions: {len(gatwick_results)}") print(f"Luton Airport mentions: {len(luton_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting technology mentions: {len(energy_results)}") # Look for specific dates and authorities date_patterns = ['2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023', '2024'] authority_patterns = ['planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'planning authority', 'government'] date_mentions = {} authority_mentions = {} for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for date in date_patterns: if date in combined_text: if date not in date_mentions: date_mentions[date] = [] date_mentions[date].append(result) for authority in authority_patterns: if authority in combined_text: if authority not in authority_mentions: authority_mentions[authority] = [] authority_mentions[authority].append(result) print(f"\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:") for date, mentions in date_mentions.items(): print(f" {date}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è AUTHORITY MENTIONS FOUND:") for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Create summary analysis summary_analysis = { 'total_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_count': len(high_relevance_results), 'medium_relevance_count': len(medium_relevance_results), 'gatwick_mentions': len(gatwick_results), 'luton_mentions': len(luton_results), 'energy_technology_mentions': len(energy_results), 'date_mentions': {date: len(mentions) for date, mentions in date_mentions.items()}, 'authority_mentions': {authority: len(mentions) for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items()} } # Save summary analysis summary_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_search_summary_scope_fixed_{timestamp}.json' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(summary_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nüíæ Summary analysis saved to: {summary_file}") else: print("\n‚ùå No search results obtained - all search methods failed") print("This could be due to:") print(" - Network connectivity issues") print(" - API rate limiting") print(" - Search terms too specific") print(" - Temporary service unavailability") print(f"\n‚úÖ Search phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific submission dates and assessing authorities.")

Code Execution - Plan #3 (Iteration 4)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime print("=== GATWICK AND LUTON AIRPORT EXPANSION PROPOSALS RESEARCH - FINAL FIX ===") print("Objective: Find non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities") print("Secondary objective: Look for energy harvesting floor tiles or kinetic energy technology") print("Fixing the 'combined_text' variable scope issue that prevented result analysis") print("=" * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables api_key_env = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key_env: print(f"‚úÖ SerpAPI key found - will use Google Search API") else: print("‚ö†Ô∏è No SerpAPI key found - will use DuckDuckGo API only") # Define comprehensive search queries targeting specific scenarios search_queries = [ # Gatwick expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Gatwick Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Gatwick Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Luton expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Luton Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Luton Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Luton Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Combined searches for both airports 'Gatwick Luton Airport expansion proposals non-shortlisted comparison', 'UK airport expansion proposals rejected Planning Inspectorate Gatwick Luton', # Energy harvesting technology searches 'Gatwick Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy', 'Luton Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy technology', 'UK airports energy harvesting floor tiles Gatwick Luton', 'airport kinetic energy floor tiles technology Gatwick Luton installation', 'energy harvesting technology airports UK Gatwick Luton renewable' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} targeted queries...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Function to search using SerpAPI (primary method) - FIXED: api_key as parameter def search_with_serpapi(query, api_key, max_results=15): """Search using SerpAPI Google Search - requires API key""" if not api_key: print("No SerpAPI key provided") return [] try: params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.co.uk", "safe": "off", "num": max_results, "type": "search", "gl": "uk" } response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() if data.get("organic_results"): return [{ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'href': result.get('link', ''), 'body': result.get('snippet', '') } for result in data["organic_results"]] return [] except Exception as e: print(f"SerpAPI search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Function to search using DuckDuckGo (fallback method) def search_with_duckduckgo(query, max_results=10): """Search using DuckDuckGo instant answer API - no key required""" try: # Use DuckDuckGo instant answer API url = "https://api.duckduckgo.com/" params = { 'q': query, 'format': 'json', 'no_redirect': '1', 'no_html': '1', 'skip_disambig': '1' } response = requests.get(url, params=params, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() results = [] # Extract abstract if available if data.get('Abstract'): results.append({ 'title': data.get('Heading', 'DuckDuckGo Result'), 'href': data.get('AbstractURL', ''), 'body': data.get('Abstract', '') }) # Extract related topics for topic in data.get('RelatedTopics', [])[:5]: if isinstance(topic, dict) and topic.get('Text'): results.append({ 'title': topic.get('Text', '')[:100], 'href': topic.get('FirstURL', ''), 'body': topic.get('Text', '') }) return results return [] except Exception as e: print(f"DuckDuckGo search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) results = [] search_method = 'none' # Try SerpAPI first if available - FIXED: pass api_key as parameter if api_key_env: print("Trying SerpAPI...") results = search_with_serpapi(query, api_key_env) if results: search_method = 'serpapi' print(f"SerpAPI returned {len(results)} results") # If no results from SerpAPI, try DuckDuckGo if not results: print("Trying DuckDuckGo API...") results = search_with_duckduckgo(query) if results: search_method = 'duckduckgo' print(f"DuckDuckGo returned {len(results)} results") if results: print(f"\n‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results using {search_method}") # Process and display results - FIXED: Properly define combined_text variable for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('href', result.get('link', 'No link')) snippet = result.get('body', result.get('snippet', 'No snippet')) print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet[:300]}..." if len(snippet) > 300 else f"Snippet: {snippet}") # FIXED: Properly define combined_text variable within the loop combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" # Key indicators for airport expansion expansion_indicators = [ 'non-shortlisted', 'rejected', 'planning inspectorate', 'expansion proposal', 'gatwick', 'luton', 'assessment authority', 'submission date', 'government assessment', 'planning authority', 'expansion decision' ] # Key indicators for energy harvesting energy_indicators = [ 'energy harvesting', 'floor tiles', 'kinetic energy', 'renewable energy', 'energy generation', 'footstep energy', 'piezoelectric', 'energy technology' ] matching_expansion = [indicator for indicator in expansion_indicators if indicator in combined_text] matching_energy = [indicator for indicator in energy_indicators if indicator in combined_text] total_matches = len(matching_expansion) + len(matching_energy) if total_matches >= 3: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - {total_matches} key indicators") if matching_expansion: print(f" Expansion indicators: {matching_expansion}") if matching_energy: print(f" Energy indicators: {matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - {total_matches} indicators: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 1: print(f"üìù Some relevance - {total_matches} indicator: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with analysis all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'expansion_indicators': matching_expansion, 'energy_indicators': matching_energy, 'total_relevance_score': total_matches, 'search_method': search_method }) else: print(f"‚ùå No results found for query {i}: '{query}'") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_expansion_search_results_final_{timestamp}.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find Gatwick and Luton Airport non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities, plus energy harvesting technology', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results, 'search_methods_used': list(set([r['search_method'] for r in all_results])) if all_results else [], 'api_key_available': bool(api_key_env) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nüìä SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") if all_results: # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nüîç ANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] >= 3] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 2] low_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 1] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (3+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results[:5]: # Show top 5 print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") if result['expansion_indicators']: print(f"Expansion indicators: {result['expansion_indicators']}") if result['energy_indicators']: print(f"Energy indicators: {result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:3]: # Show top 3 print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['expansion_indicators'] + result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nLow relevance results (1 indicator): {len(low_relevance_results)}") # Look for specific airport mentions and key information print(f"\n\nüè¢ SPECIFIC AIRPORT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) gatwick_results = [r for r in all_results if 'gatwick' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] luton_results = [r for r in all_results if 'luton' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] energy_results = [r for r in all_results if len(r['energy_indicators']) > 0] print(f"Gatwick Airport mentions: {len(gatwick_results)}") print(f"Luton Airport mentions: {len(luton_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting technology mentions: {len(energy_results)}") # Look for specific dates and authorities date_patterns = ['2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023', '2024'] authority_patterns = ['planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'planning authority', 'government'] date_mentions = {} authority_mentions = {} for result in all_results: combined_text_analysis = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for date in date_patterns: if date in combined_text_analysis: if date not in date_mentions: date_mentions[date] = [] date_mentions[date].append(result) for authority in authority_patterns: if authority in combined_text_analysis: if authority not in authority_mentions: authority_mentions[authority] = [] authority_mentions[authority].append(result) print(f"\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:") for date, mentions in date_mentions.items(): print(f" {date}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è AUTHORITY MENTIONS FOUND:") for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Create summary analysis summary_analysis = { 'total_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_count': len(high_relevance_results), 'medium_relevance_count': len(medium_relevance_results), 'gatwick_mentions': len(gatwick_results), 'luton_mentions': len(luton_results), 'energy_technology_mentions': len(energy_results), 'date_mentions': {date: len(mentions) for date, mentions in date_mentions.items()}, 'authority_mentions': {authority: len(mentions) for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items()} } # Save summary analysis summary_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_search_summary_final_{timestamp}.json' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(summary_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nüíæ Summary analysis saved to: {summary_file}") # Look for specific evidence of non-shortlisted proposals print(f"\n\nüîç SEARCHING FOR NON-SHORTLISTED EVIDENCE:") print("=" * 50) non_shortlisted_evidence = [] rejection_evidence = [] for result in all_results: combined_search_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" if 'non-shortlisted' in combined_search_text: non_shortlisted_evidence.append(result) if any(term in combined_search_text for term in ['rejected', 'refused', 'declined']): rejection_evidence.append(result) print(f"Non-shortlisted mentions: {len(non_shortlisted_evidence)}") print(f"Rejection mentions: {len(rejection_evidence)}") if non_shortlisted_evidence: print(f"\nüìã NON-SHORTLISTED EVIDENCE:") for evidence in non_shortlisted_evidence[:3]: print(f" ‚Ä¢ {evidence['title']}") print(f" {evidence['snippet'][:150]}...") if rejection_evidence: print(f"\n‚ùå REJECTION EVIDENCE:") for evidence in rejection_evidence[:3]: print(f" ‚Ä¢ {evidence['title']}") print(f" {evidence['snippet'][:150]}...") else: print("\n‚ùå No search results obtained - all search methods failed") print("This could be due to:") print(" - Network connectivity issues") print(" - API rate limiting") print(" - Search terms too specific") print(" - Temporary service unavailability") print(f"\n‚úÖ Search phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific submission dates and assessing authorities.")
Execution Output

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution successful - Code ran without errors and completed comprehensive search execution for Gatwick and Luton Airport expansion proposals. The search successfully collected 234 results across 17 targeted queries using SerpAPI, with excellent coverage of both airports and relevant authorities. PLAN alignment: 85% complete. Key findings: (1) Found multiple high-relevance results (13 total) showing both Gatwick and Luton expansion proposals were rejected by the Planning Inspectorate, (2) Identified specific evidence that Planning Inspectorate recommended rejection for both airports' expansion proposals, (3) Discovered timeline information including examination periods and decision dates, (4) Located 36 energy harvesting technology mentions though no direct connection to these specific airports was found. The code successfully saved comprehensive results to workspace files for detailed analysis. However, execution was interrupted by a variable scope error ('combined_search_text' not defined) in the final analysis section, preventing complete evidence compilation for non-shortlisted proposals. Recommendation: Save the extensive search results already collected to workspace files as they contain valuable data about Planning Inspectorate rejections and assessment authorities that directly addresses the PLAN requirements.
Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime print("=== GATWICK AND LUTON AIRPORT EXPANSION PROPOSALS RESEARCH - FINAL FIX ===") print("Objective: Find non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities") print("Secondary objective: Look for energy harvesting floor tiles or kinetic energy technology") print("Fixing the 'combined_text' variable scope issue that prevented result analysis") print("=" * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables api_key_env = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key_env: print(f"‚úÖ SerpAPI key found - will use Google Search API") else: print("‚ö†Ô∏è No SerpAPI key found - will use DuckDuckGo API only") # Define comprehensive search queries targeting specific scenarios search_queries = [ # Gatwick expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Gatwick Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Gatwick Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Gatwick Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Luton expansion non-shortlisted searches 'Luton Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate', 'Luton Airport expansion rejected submission date month year', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal assessment authority decision', '"Luton Airport" expansion "non-shortlisted" "Planning Inspectorate"', 'Luton Airport expansion proposal rejected government assessment', # Combined searches for both airports 'Gatwick Luton Airport expansion proposals non-shortlisted comparison', 'UK airport expansion proposals rejected Planning Inspectorate Gatwick Luton', # Energy harvesting technology searches 'Gatwick Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy', 'Luton Airport energy harvesting floor tiles kinetic energy technology', 'UK airports energy harvesting floor tiles Gatwick Luton', 'airport kinetic energy floor tiles technology Gatwick Luton installation', 'energy harvesting technology airports UK Gatwick Luton renewable' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} targeted queries...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Function to search using SerpAPI (primary method) - FIXED: api_key as parameter def search_with_serpapi(query, api_key, max_results=15): """Search using SerpAPI Google Search - requires API key""" if not api_key: print("No SerpAPI key provided") return [] try: params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.co.uk", "safe": "off", "num": max_results, "type": "search", "gl": "uk" } response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() if data.get("organic_results"): return [{ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'href': result.get('link', ''), 'body': result.get('snippet', '') } for result in data["organic_results"]] return [] except Exception as e: print(f"SerpAPI search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Function to search using DuckDuckGo (fallback method) def search_with_duckduckgo(query, max_results=10): """Search using DuckDuckGo instant answer API - no key required""" try: # Use DuckDuckGo instant answer API url = "https://api.duckduckgo.com/" params = { 'q': query, 'format': 'json', 'no_redirect': '1', 'no_html': '1', 'skip_disambig': '1' } response = requests.get(url, params=params, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() results = [] # Extract abstract if available if data.get('Abstract'): results.append({ 'title': data.get('Heading', 'DuckDuckGo Result'), 'href': data.get('AbstractURL', ''), 'body': data.get('Abstract', '') }) # Extract related topics for topic in data.get('RelatedTopics', [])[:5]: if isinstance(topic, dict) and topic.get('Text'): results.append({ 'title': topic.get('Text', '')[:100], 'href': topic.get('FirstURL', ''), 'body': topic.get('Text', '') }) return results return [] except Exception as e: print(f"DuckDuckGo search error: {str(e)}") return [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) results = [] search_method = 'none' # Try SerpAPI first if available - FIXED: pass api_key as parameter if api_key_env: print("Trying SerpAPI...") results = search_with_serpapi(query, api_key_env) if results: search_method = 'serpapi' print(f"SerpAPI returned {len(results)} results") # If no results from SerpAPI, try DuckDuckGo if not results: print("Trying DuckDuckGo API...") results = search_with_duckduckgo(query) if results: search_method = 'duckduckgo' print(f"DuckDuckGo returned {len(results)} results") if results: print(f"\n‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results using {search_method}") # Process and display results - FIXED: Properly define combined_text variable for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('href', result.get('link', 'No link')) snippet = result.get('body', result.get('snippet', 'No snippet')) print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet[:300]}..." if len(snippet) > 300 else f"Snippet: {snippet}") # FIXED: Properly define combined_text variable within the loop combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" # Key indicators for airport expansion expansion_indicators = [ 'non-shortlisted', 'rejected', 'planning inspectorate', 'expansion proposal', 'gatwick', 'luton', 'assessment authority', 'submission date', 'government assessment', 'planning authority', 'expansion decision' ] # Key indicators for energy harvesting energy_indicators = [ 'energy harvesting', 'floor tiles', 'kinetic energy', 'renewable energy', 'energy generation', 'footstep energy', 'piezoelectric', 'energy technology' ] matching_expansion = [indicator for indicator in expansion_indicators if indicator in combined_text] matching_energy = [indicator for indicator in energy_indicators if indicator in combined_text] total_matches = len(matching_expansion) + len(matching_energy) if total_matches >= 3: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - {total_matches} key indicators") if matching_expansion: print(f" Expansion indicators: {matching_expansion}") if matching_energy: print(f" Energy indicators: {matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - {total_matches} indicators: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") elif total_matches >= 1: print(f"üìù Some relevance - {total_matches} indicator: {matching_expansion + matching_energy}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with analysis all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'expansion_indicators': matching_expansion, 'energy_indicators': matching_energy, 'total_relevance_score': total_matches, 'search_method': search_method }) else: print(f"‚ùå No results found for query {i}: '{query}'") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_expansion_search_results_final_{timestamp}.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find Gatwick and Luton Airport non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities, plus energy harvesting technology', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results, 'search_methods_used': list(set([r['search_method'] for r in all_results])) if all_results else [], 'api_key_available': bool(api_key_env) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nüìä SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") if all_results: # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nüîç ANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] >= 3] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 2] low_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['total_relevance_score'] == 1] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (3+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results[:5]: # Show top 5 print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") if result['expansion_indicators']: print(f"Expansion indicators: {result['expansion_indicators']}") if result['energy_indicators']: print(f"Energy indicators: {result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:3]: # Show top 3 print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['expansion_indicators'] + result['energy_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nLow relevance results (1 indicator): {len(low_relevance_results)}") # Look for specific airport mentions and key information print(f"\n\nüè¢ SPECIFIC AIRPORT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) gatwick_results = [r for r in all_results if 'gatwick' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] luton_results = [r for r in all_results if 'luton' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] energy_results = [r for r in all_results if len(r['energy_indicators']) > 0] print(f"Gatwick Airport mentions: {len(gatwick_results)}") print(f"Luton Airport mentions: {len(luton_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting technology mentions: {len(energy_results)}") # Look for specific dates and authorities date_patterns = ['2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023', '2024'] authority_patterns = ['planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'planning authority', 'government'] date_mentions = {} authority_mentions = {} for result in all_results: combined_text_analysis = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for date in date_patterns: if date in combined_text_analysis: if date not in date_mentions: date_mentions[date] = [] date_mentions[date].append(result) for authority in authority_patterns: if authority in combined_text_analysis: if authority not in authority_mentions: authority_mentions[authority] = [] authority_mentions[authority].append(result) print(f"\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:") for date, mentions in date_mentions.items(): print(f" {date}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è AUTHORITY MENTIONS FOUND:") for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} results") if mentions: print(f" Sample: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Create summary analysis summary_analysis = { 'total_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_count': len(high_relevance_results), 'medium_relevance_count': len(medium_relevance_results), 'gatwick_mentions': len(gatwick_results), 'luton_mentions': len(luton_results), 'energy_technology_mentions': len(energy_results), 'date_mentions': {date: len(mentions) for date, mentions in date_mentions.items()}, 'authority_mentions': {authority: len(mentions) for authority, mentions in authority_mentions.items()} } # Save summary analysis summary_file = f'workspace/gatwick_luton_search_summary_final_{timestamp}.json' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(summary_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nüíæ Summary analysis saved to: {summary_file}") # Look for specific evidence of non-shortlisted proposals print(f"\n\nüîç SEARCHING FOR NON-SHORTLISTED EVIDENCE:") print("=" * 50) non_shortlisted_evidence = [] rejection_evidence = [] for result in all_results: combined_search_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" if 'non-shortlisted' in combined_search_text: non_shortlisted_evidence.append(result) if any(term in combined_search_text for term in ['rejected', 'refused', 'declined']): rejection_evidence.append(result) print(f"Non-shortlisted mentions: {len(non_shortlisted_evidence)}") print(f"Rejection mentions: {len(rejection_evidence)}") if non_shortlisted_evidence: print(f"\nüìã NON-SHORTLISTED EVIDENCE:") for evidence in non_shortlisted_evidence[:3]: print(f" ‚Ä¢ {evidence['title']}") print(f" {evidence['snippet'][:150]}...") if rejection_evidence: print(f"\n‚ùå REJECTION EVIDENCE:") for evidence in rejection_evidence[:3]: print(f" ‚Ä¢ {evidence['title']}") print(f" {evidence['snippet'][:150]}...") else: print("\n‚ùå No search results obtained - all search methods failed") print("This could be due to:") print(" - Network connectivity issues") print(" - API rate limiting") print(" - Search terms too specific") print(" - Temporary service unavailability") print(f"\n‚úÖ Search phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific submission dates and assessing authorities.")
Execution Output
Code Output: === GATWICK AND LUTON AIRPORT EXPANSION PROPOSALS RESEARCH - FINAL FIX === Objective: Find non-shortlisted expansion proposals with submission dates and assessing authorities Secondary objective: Look for energy harvesting floor tiles or kinetic energy technology Fixing the 'combined_text' variable scope issue that prevented result analysis ================================================================================ ‚úÖ SerpAPI key found - will use Google Search API Starting comprehensive search with 17 targeted queries... ================================================================================ Search 1/17: Gatwick Airport expansion proposal non-shortlisted Planning Inspectorate ------------------------------------------------------------ Trying SerpAPI... Code Execution - Plan #3 (Iteration 5)
